cells.data:
-- tupleFromArray [a] -> (a, a ...)
on tupleFromArray(xs)
    set lng to length of xs
    if lng > 1 then
        if lng > 2 then
            set strSuffix to lng as string
        else
            set strSuffix to ""
        end if
        script kv
            on |λ|(a, x, i)
                insertMap(a, (i as string), x)
            end |λ|
        end script
        foldl(kv, {type:"Tuple" & strSuffix}, xs)
    else
        missing value
    end if
end tupleFromArray
